this_title: The Making of Matthew Bourne's The Car Man
trans_title: 马修·伯恩卡门独家幕后
introduction: Choreographer Matthew Bourne and lead cast and crew members discuss the making of New Adventures’ dance production of The Car Man. Exploring the overall concept, characterisation and plot, this collection of interviews highlights key creative processes and influences.https://www.digitaltheatre.com/watch/38167404
chinese_title: 马修·伯恩卡门独家幕后
foreign_title: The Making of Matthew Bourne's The Car Man
